post_title: Ideas for romantic place/activity in Bratislava?

comments.author: Bocko_SVK
comments.body:
Maybe this New years cruise on a ship with dinner? 
I tried something similar some time ago for Valentines day and it was very nice:

https://www.lod.sk/en/cruises-2/vecera-na-dunaji-3/detail/new-years-cruise/
